sentences.en: He is masterful and rather unsociable.
He stared down at his dinner plate in a morose and unsociable manner.
sentences.cn: 他低头盯着餐盘,一副冷淡不友好的样子.

sentences.en: He taciturn and unsociable, and rarely spoke to you.
sentences.cn: 他总是不声不响,冷冰冰的, 难得跟你交谈.

sentences.en: He was taciturn and unsociable, and rarely spoke to you.
sentences.cn: 他总是不声不响, 冷冰冰的,难得跟你周旋.

sentences.en: His unsociable character makes it hard for us to get along with each other.
sentences.cn: 他落落的性格导致我们很难相处.

sentences.en: I was in my usual post - visit mood: tired and unsociable.
sentences.cn: 和每次探视之后一样,我的情绪疲惫而孤僻.

sentences.en: I wouldn't entertain the idea of such an unsociable job.
sentences.cn: 我不会考虑从事这种不跟人打交道的工作。

sentences.en: My marriage has broken up. It has made me reclusive and unsociable.
sentences.cn: 我的婚姻破裂了。这让我变得孤僻、不愿与人来往。

sentences.en: My mother despairs of me; she thinks me lazy and unsociable.
sentences.cn: 母亲十分担心我, 她认为我懒惰且不合群.

sentences.en: Nowadays children are becoming more and more lazy, fat and unsociable, give reason and solution.
sentences.cn: 现在孩子变的越来越懒惰, 肥胖和不爱交际, 给出原因和解决方法!

sentences.en: The man's unsociable behavior gradually alienated him from all his friends.
sentences.cn: 那个人不友善的行为渐渐使他和所有的朋友疏远了.

sentences.en: The unsociable person is hardly fit for a diplomat.
sentences.cn: 不擅社交的人几乎不适合做外交家.

sentences.en: The woman's unsociable behaviour gradually alienated her from all her friends.
sentences.cn: 那个妇女不友好的行为渐渐地使她和所有朋友疏远了.

sentences.en: Thus the child will grow to be unsociable and eccentric.
sentences.cn: 结果使孩子上学独往独来,很少与人交往,容易养成性情孤僻、怪、合群,从而不能形成完整的人格.

words.tran_cn: 非社会的；不合群的；孤僻的；不善交际的
不爱交际的；不与人亲近的；不和气的

trans.tran_en: not wanting to be with people or to go to social events
